mapper.select: SELECT A.res_violation_status AS violationStatus, B.res_use_type AS buildingPurpose FROM api_building_register A LEFT JOIN api_building_register_building_status B ON A.id = B.register_id WHERE A.latitude BETWEEN #{lat} - 0.0001 AND #{lat} + 0.0001 AND A.longitude BETWEEN #{lng} - 0.0001 AND #{lng} + 0.0001 LIMIT 1;
